mapper.select: select case when job = 1 then '班主任' when job = 2 then '讲师' when job = 3 then '学工主管' when job = 4 then '教研主管' when job = 5 then '咨询师' else '其他' end pos, count(*) num from emp group by job order by num
select if(gender = 1, '男性员工', '女性员工') as name, count(*) value from emp group by gender
select clazz.name as clazzList, count(student.id) dataList from clazz left join student on clazz.id = student.clazz_id group by clazz.name order by dataList

select case when degree = 1 then '初中' when degree = 2 then '高中' when degree = 3 then '大专' when degree = 4 then '本科' when degree = 5 then '硕士' when degree = 6 then '博士' else '其他' end as name, count(*) value from student group by degree order by value
